title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin back in the big chair, he would much rather be the Los Angeles Lakers than the Boston Celtics. It's time to find the next Chris Paul because the basketball gods have rendered a decision that he won't be winning a title with the Phoenix Suns. Plus, another riveting edition of: "Where Colin was Right and Wrong!"

Guest: Antoine Walker

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
